title: Lost Email?
body:
I have an account, but I don't remember what e-mail address I registered it with. I still have access with the password, but would like to know the account e-mail.
I can post from it if it helps.

replies.body: No worries, we can help update your info and recovery your account!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will get back to you as soon as they can!
